name: Dreams Patrol
description:
The DreamPatrol is a unit that keep our dreams clean, every night they are fighting the nightmears in order to make sure we will have a fine dream.

in this game, the player control one of thier DreamShips (using the arrow keys), he needs to shoot (using space or right arrow key) the nightmares and avoid crushing into some dreams. at the end of each level (time based) the score will be calculated based on nightmares & dreams killed, if the score will be a positive number the player will be allowed to continue to the next level, if the player will not have a positive number he will fail and the poor boy will have a nightmare this night ;(

the game isnt that hard, even though he is quite tricky. have fun you all.
